lines.text: Hi, Mr. Collier. Wendy's waiting for you.
Joanne MacIntire, the warden wants to see you, *now*.
It's okay, sweetheart, the warden meets with all the new girls just to explain the rules and the procedures. It's really nothing to worry about.

[laughs]
They just want to *fuck* you. They *all* want to fuck you.

You've gotta be very careful in what you say and you've gotta be very careful in what you do. Gotta play the game, honey. You know the game, don't you? Well, you see, I am the rules. I decide who comes, and I decide who leaves. I decide *when* they come, and I decide when they leave.
What about the parole board? My parole's up in six months.

I am the parole board, dear. Of course I can be a very lenient parole board or I can be a very difficult one. It all depends on how you play the game. Now, if you see any subversive activities of any kind, any goings on around the jail that might make you suspicious, I want you to tell your warden, I want you to tell me, right away. Okay?
You want me to *rat* on them?

Exactly. You're shy aren't you? You'll learn fast, number 5-7-3-9-2-1-3. There's one rule... that everybody must play by. I'm going to fuck you. It may be today, or it may be tomorrow, but I *am* going to fuck you. And when you learn to play the game, then maybe you can leave.

[voiceover]
Our players include, the beautiful Ginger Lynn, big Joey Silvera, the rising star Raven, Kristara Barrington, George Payne, Chelsea Blake, Dick Howard, Kelly Nichols, Taija Rae, and the ever ready Jerry Abel, and Paul Thomas as the little warden who could.
